mapper.insert: insert into board (board_no,board_name,board_title, board_pwd,board_cont,board_ref,board_step, board_level,board_date) values(board_no_seq.nextval, #{board_name},#{board_title},#{board_pwd},#{board_cont}, board_no_seq.nextval,0,0,sysdate)
mapper.update: update board set board_hit=board_hit+1 where board_no=#{board_no}
